content.description: Climb the obvious finger crack, sustained
content.protection: single rack and many a small wires
content.location: Around the corner from the cave, inwhich the Ravin and Flying Trapeze climb out of.

content.description:
Good little route.  Start up blocky crack 5' to the right of The Killer Flake.  Move up protect and pull onto the slab and set up below a small roof.  Move up and over the left side of the roof on good holds.  The anchor is just above the flake. 

  Variation:  5.7   Climb under the flake to the right and avoid pulling the roof.
content.location: Between The Killer Flake and Zack Attack

content.description: Start a few feet to the right of the gully, gain the first ledge 10' up via a flake. move up the groove and left to a mantle on the corner. Climb out the left corner of the roof or traverse right under the roof and up to the dirt.
content.protection: TR off of anchors or rope solo
content.location: This the first climb you'll see to the left of Can the Jingo, across from the gilly

content.description: This is the best and cleanest section of cliff.  Starting from the gulley to the right of main cliff to the face down around the corner and to the right of Zack Attack.  Ends at the next gulley before the Bruisemaster Block.
